The basic population consists of non-state economic enterprises which employ more than 20 persons, and which belong to the industrial or service providing sector in five big cities outside Budapest. It was based on a random selection from the company registry database of TeleDirect considering the criteria mentioned before. Another criterion in the selection of companies was whether or not there was fluctuation of labor in the past two years. The rate of refusing to answer was 19%.
Telephone interview based on questionnaire.
